title: Language Recogniton
detail: This project aims to recognize handwritten scripts and to which language they belong. Currently three languages are supported i.e English(International), Hindi(National), Odia(Regional) and character set of script is limited to digits only.

title: Recruit.me
detail: This project aims at improving resume screening process. Applicants for interview can provide their user handles of various online platforms like GitHub, LinkedIn, codechef, hackerrank etc. All the relevant info of their accounts will be presented to interviewer in intuitive manner
